column2: Project Role : Technology Educator Project Role Description : Instrumental in keeping technology talent market relevant, by upskilling and cross skilling them. Primarily responsible for delivering foundational training in technology, delivery, professional development and industry content. Contribute to course content development and creation of questions for certification and assessments.  Must have skills : AWS Architecture Good to have skills : NA Minimum  7.5  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : BTech BE MCA Equivalent IT Qualification Key Responsibilities:?Advanced Training Program Development:Craft and enhance AWS training programs for diverse skill levels, focusing on complex architectural principles, cutting-edge services (Amazon EC2, Amazon S3, AWS Lambda), and advanced Generative AI applications using tools like Amazon Bedrock and SageMaker.?Strategic Curriculum Planning:Lead the strategic design of the curriculum and training content, incorporating the latest in AWS innovations, cloud computing trends, and industry demands to keep the curriculum at the forefront of technological advancements.?Expert-Led Practical Sessions:Direct advanced practical exercises and projects that push the boundaries of AWS services and Generative AI applications, ensuring learners tackle real-world challenges and master the nuances of machine learning tools in AWS.?Ethics and Compliance Leadership:Champion ethical AI use and robust security practices across all training and project implementations, setting standards for responsible AI development within the organization.?Certification Mastery:Drive AWS certification initiatives, crafting pathways for learners to attain high-level certifications, thus fostering professional advancement and recognizing expertise in AWS cloud services.?Strategic Stakeholder Engagement:Engage with key stakeholders at a strategic level, aligning training objectives with organizational goals and technological trends, and spearheading new program initiatives from ideation through to successful execution.?Community and Industry Influence:Elevate the organization's presence in the AWS and AI community, leading by example through thought leadership, advanced discussions, and high-profile speaking engagements.?Leadership in Continuous Learning:Lead the charge in upskilling initiatives, not just following but setting trends in cloud-native and cloud-adjacent technologies, ensuring the organization remains at the cutting edge.?Advanced Program Management:Employ refined program/project management techniques to oversee the development and implementation of innovative learning programs in cloud technologies, guaranteeing their alignment with industry needs and organizational goals. Technical Experience:?Architectural Mastery in AWS:Possess unmatched expertise in AWS cloud architecture, demonstrating advanced skills in deploying, managing, and optimizing AWS services like Amazon EC2, Amazon S3, AWS Lambda, and Amazon SageMaker.?Innovative AI Solution Implementation:Show proven success in architecting and executing sophisticated machine learning and AI solutions on AWS, leveraging advanced tools and methodologies to drive innovation.?Curriculum Innovation:Expertly craft and continually refine training materials to encapsulate the most recent AWS advancements, ensuring technical accuracy and relevance to current industry practices.?Advanced Practical Leadership:Lead by example in conducting high-level practical sessions, providing mentorship in applying AWS services and Generative AI in complex and innovative projects.?Certification Strategy Expertise:Demonstrate a strategic approach to AWS certification pathways, designing and implementing programs that ensure high certification success rates among learners.?Strategic Program Oversight:Show a proven track record in strategic program and project management, with the ability to oversee the lifecycle of cutting-edge tech education programs.?Dynamic Stakeholder Management:Exhibit advanced stakeholder management skills, adept at navigating complex relationships and aligning training initiatives with broad organizational strategies.?Trendsetting in Tech Education:Act as a trendsetter in continuous learning, constantly engaging with new technologies and methodologies to keep the organization ahead in cloud and AI competencies.?Community Leadership:Stand out as a leader in the AWS and AI community, contributing significantly to discussions, writings, and presentations that shape industry directions and perceptions. Professional Attributes: Passion to train and enable employees on Cloud and Cloud Native Skills  Passion to learn and quickly upskill self on Cloud and Cloud Native areas Ability to collaborate with different stakeholders  Self-learning capabilities Good team player Demonstrated program/project management skills Ability to mentor employees in team Self-learning capabilitiesEducational Qualification: B.Tech. /B.E. / MCA / Equivalent IT QualificationAdditional Information: Good communication, analytical and presentation skills  Prior experience in training delivery is desirable Qualification BTech BE MCA Equivalent IT Qualification
column11: project management, cloud services, cloud architecture, aws cloud, aws, presentation skills, aws sagemaker, training, machine learning, aws lambda, professional development, training programs, amazon ec2, content development, assessment, training delivery

column2: Project Role : Technology Educator Project Role Description : Instrumental in keeping technology talent market relevant, by upskilling and cross skilling them. Primarily responsible for delivering foundational training in technology, delivery, professional development and industry content. Contribute to course content development and creation of questions for certification and assessments.  Must have skills : Python (Programming Language) Good to have skills : NA Minimum  3  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : BTech BE MCA Equivalent IT Qualification Key Responsibilities:?Python Training Delivery:Conduct engaging and informative Python programming training sessions for beginners, intermediate and advanced learners, covering foundational concepts, data structures, algorithms, and application development.?Content Development:Create dynamic training materials, including tutorials, exercises, and case studies that align with current programming practices and Python version updates. Focus on making complex concepts accessible and engaging.?Upskilling Initiatives:Lead upskilling efforts for learners by introducing advanced Python topics, such as asynchronous programming, decorators, and context managers, to ensure continuous learning and skill enhancement.?Cloud Integration Examples:Incorporate examples and exercises that demonstrate how Python interacts with cloud services (AWS, Google Cloud Platform, Azure), emphasizing the use of Python SDKs for cloud automation and application development.?Certification Guidance:Provide structured guidance and resources to help learners prepare for Python-related certifications, enhancing their professional credibility and job marketability.?Interactive Learning Environment:Foster an interactive and supportive learning environment, encouraging questions, facilitating discussions, and promoting a collaborative learning culture.?Continuous Content Update:Regularly update training content to reflect the latest Python developments, security best practices, and cloud technology trends, ensuring the training program remains relevant and up-to-date.?Feedback Implementation:Actively seek and incorporate feedback from learners and stakeholders to improve training effectiveness, content relevance, and delivery methods.?Community Engagement:Participate in Python programming communities, forums, and events to stay informed about industry trends, share knowledge, and bring insights back to enrich the training program.?Personal Development:Pursue continuous personal development in Python programming, cloud technologies, and educational methodologies to enhance teaching effectiveness and technical expertise. Technical Experience:?Proficient in Python Programming:Demonstrated proficiency in Python, with a strong grasp of its syntax, standard library, and development environments. Experience with both Python 2.x and 3.x versions is preferred.?Content Creation Expertise:Experienced in developing comprehensive training materials, including written content, video tutorials, and interactive exercises tailored to varying skill levels.?Practical Python Application:Hands-on experience with applying Python in real-world scenarios, ranging from simple scripts to complex application development, including web development with frameworks like Flask or Django.?Cloud Familiarity:Basic to intermediate knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) and how to use Python to interact with cloud services, automate tasks, and develop cloud-based applications.?Interactive Teaching Style:Skilled in delivering interactive and engaging training sessions, capable of adapting teaching methods to suit diverse learning styles and technical backgrounds.?Feedback-Driven Improvement:Proven ability to use feedback constructively to continually improve training content and delivery, ensuring high levels of learner satisfaction and achievement.?Community Active Participation:Active involvement in Python programming and related learning communities, demonstrating a commitment to staying up-to-date with the latest trends, techniques, and best practices in Python programming and education. Professional Attributes: Passion to train and enable employees on Cloud and Cloud Native Skills  Passion to learn and quickly upskill self on Cloud and Cloud Native areas Ability to collaborate with different stakeholders  Self-learning capabilities Good team player Demonstrated program/project management skills Ability to mentor employees in team Self-learning capabilitiesEducational Qualification: B.Tech. /B.E. / MCA / Equivalent IT QualificationAdditional Information: Good communication, analytical and presentation skills  Prior experience in training delivery is desirable Qualification BTech BE MCA Equivalent IT Qualification
column11: python, project management, microsoft azure, aws, flask, presentation skills, teaching, training, professional development, content creation, assessment, content development, curriculum development, django, gcp, content writing, coaching, training delivery

column2: Project Role : Technology Educator Project Role Description : Instrumental in keeping technology talent market relevant, by upskilling and cross skilling them. Primarily responsible for delivering foundational training in technology, delivery, professional development and industry content. Contribute to course content development and creation of questions for certification and assessments.  Must have skills : Java Standard Edition Good to have skills : Java Concurrent Programming Minimum  3  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : BTech BE MCA Equivalent IT Qualification Key Responsibilities:?Java Training Delivery:Facilitate engaging Java training sessions covering core Java, advanced Java concepts, frameworks like Spring and Hibernate, and application development practices.?Content Creation and Curriculum Development:Develop and update comprehensive training materials, including lectures, code labs, and project-based learning exercises that align with the latest Java versions and industry standards.?Upskilling and Continuous Learning:Lead efforts to introduce learners to new Java features, architectural patterns, and best practices, ensuring they remain at the forefront of technology advancements.?Cloud Technology Integration:Integrate practical exercises demonstrating the use of Java with cloud services (AWS, Google Cloud Platform, Azure), highlighting how Java applications can be deployed, managed, and scaled in the cloud.?Certification Preparation:Guide learners through the preparation for Java-related certifications providing them with the necessary resources and study plans to succeed.?Interactive Learning Environment:Create a dynamic and supportive learning environment, encouraging participation, facilitating peer learning, and fostering a community of Java developers.?Content Relevance and Updating:Continuously review and update training materials to reflect new Java developments, security practices, and cloud technology trends, ensuring the curriculum's effectiveness and relevance.?Feedback Implementation:Solicit and incorporate feedback from learners and stakeholders to enhance the quality and impact of the training program.?Professional Development and Community Engagement:Actively participate in Java and software development communities, staying informed about technological trends and sharing knowledge both within and outside the training sessions.?Self-Improvement:Commit to personal growth in Java programming, cloud technologies, and pedagogical skills to improve training delivery and effectiveness. Technical Experience:?Core/ Advanced Java Knowledge:Demonstrated expertise in Java programming, including familiarity with its ecosystem, development tools, and best practices in software development using Java.?Curriculum Design and Content Development:Experience in creating detailed training materials, hands-on exercises, and real-world project scenarios that cater to learners at different proficiency levels.?Practical Application and Project Experience:Hands-on experience in developing and deploying Java applications, with a focus on modern frameworks and technologies such as Spring, Hibernate, and microservices architectures.?Cloud Services Proficiency:Knowledgeable in utilizing Java with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure), including deploying Java applications, using cloud databases, and implementing cloud-native services.?Certification Guidance:Proven track record in guiding learners towards achieving Java certifications, with an in-depth understanding of the certification landscape and exam preparation strategies.?Engaging Training Delivery:Skilled in delivering interactive and impactful training sessions, capable of adapting teaching styles to accommodate diverse learner needs and enhance engagement.?Community Involvement:Active participation in Java and broader software development communities, contributing to discussions, writing technical articles, and staying abreast of emerging trends and technologies. Professional Attributes: Passion to train and enable employees on Cloud and Cloud Native Skills  Passion to learn and quickly upskill self on Cloud and Cloud Native areas Ability to collaborate with different stakeholders  Self-learning capabilities Good team player Demonstrated program/project management skills Ability to mentor employees in team Self-learning capabilitiesEducational Qualification: B.Tech. /B.E. / MCA / Equivalent IT QualificationAdditional Information: Good communication, analytical and presentation skills  Prior experience in training delivery is desirable Qualification BTech BE MCA Equivalent IT Qualification
column11: project management, microsoft azure, java standard edition, spring, java, law, teaching, hibernate, professional development, microservices, curriculum development, assessment, curriculum designing, gcp, lecturer activities, aws, training delivery

column2: Project Role : Technology Educator Project Role Description : Instrumental in keeping technology talent market relevant, by upskilling and cross skilling them. Primarily responsible for delivering foundational training in technology, delivery, professional development and industry content. Contribute to course content development and creation of questions for certification and assessments.  Must have skills : Informatica PowerCenter Good to have skills : NA Minimum  5  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : BTech BE MCA Equivalent IT Qualification ?Key Responsibilities:?Informatica PowerCenter Expertise:Provide in-depth training on Informatica PowerCenter, covering its architecture, components (like PowerCenter Designer, Workflow Manager, Workflow Monitor), and functionalities to enable robust data integration processes.?Advanced Data Integration Techniques:Teach advanced data integration techniques using Informatica PowerCenter, including complex transformations, error handling, optimization strategies, and best practices for designing scalable ETL solutions.?Real-world Project Scenarios:Design training modules that incorporate real-world project scenarios, allowing employees to gain hands-on experience with Informatica PowerCenter in simulating data integration, data warehousing, and data migration tasks.?Performance Tuning and Optimization:Include sessions on performance tuning and optimization of Informatica PowerCenter workflows, highlighting techniques to enhance efficiency and throughput of data processing tasks.?Data Quality and Governance:Emphasize the importance of data quality and governance in training, teaching methods to use Informatica PowerCenter for ensuring data cleanliness, accuracy, and consistency across enterprise data platforms.?Stakeholder Management:Engage with both internal and external stakeholders to align training objectives with organizational goals and current industry trends. Lead and manage new program initiatives from inception to execution.?Engagement and Community Participation:Cultivate a dynamic learning atmosphere, promote active participation, and contribute to the AWS and AI communities through blogs, discussions, and public speaking to share insights.?Continuous Learning and Development:Commit to personal upskilling in cloud-native and related technologies, ensuring the training program remains cutting-edge.?Program and Project Management:Apply project management principles to develop, launch, and oversee new cloud technology learning programs, ensuring their successful rollout and impact.? Technical Experience?Advanced Informatica PowerCenter Skills:Demonstrated expertise in Informatica PowerCenter, with the ability to develop, deploy, and manage complex ETL processes, and a deep understanding of PowerCenter's advanced features for data integration.?Project Implementation Experience:Hands-on experience with implementing Informatica PowerCenter in enterprise environments, including data warehousing, data migration, and data synchronization projects, showcasing a track record of successful data integration solutions.?Optimization and Performance Tuning:Proficiency in optimizing and performance tuning of Informatica PowerCenter processes, with skills in identifying bottlenecks and implementing solutions to maximize data processing performance.?Data Quality Management:Experience in leveraging Informatica PowerCenter for data quality and governance initiatives, ensuring the integrity and reliability of data across systems.?Cloud Integration Knowledge:Familiarity with integrating Informatica PowerCenter with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP), enabling cloud-based data integration workflows and understanding of cloud data storage and processing techniques.?Continuous Learning in Data Technologies:A commitment to staying abreast of the latest developments in Informatica PowerCenter and other data integration and analytics technologies, ensuring training programs are updated with the most current practices and tools. ? Professional Attributes: Passion to train and enable employees on new Data and Analytics skills Passion to learn and quickly upskill on new tools and technologies in Data and Analytics  Ability to collaborate with different stakeholders  Self-learning capabilities Good team player Demonstrated program/project management skills Ability to mentor employees in team?Educational Qualification: B.Tech. /B.E. / MCA / Equivalent IT Qualification Qualification BTech BE MCA Equivalent IT Qualification
column11: project management, informatica powercenter, performance tuning, data integration, powercenter, data warehousing, microsoft azure, teaching, professional development, training programs, assessment, content development, gcp, etl, aws, informatica

column2: The Officer, Early Childhood Educator will be responsible for sessions with parents and children, and curricula focusing on primary and pre-primary school students.      The early childhood educator is responsible for providing developmentally appropriate programs that are aligned with national norms of the state.      Ability to create prototype that can be scaled in different set ups across states.      Deep research attitude and data-driven instruction-making abilities with agility to work with constant changes.          Roles and responsibilities:        Strong understanding of pedagogy and child development-related theories and practices, and an ability to combine theory and practice for on-ground execution. You are motivated by the desire to optimize the organization s productivity by building and nurturing the foundations of ECE and bringing it to life through our programs.          Develop and implement developmentally appropriate curriculum plans and instructional materials for the foundation level (pre-school to early primary) in alignment with educational standards and objectives.            Capacity building of teams, partner staff related stakeholders and other program aspects. Design t      echnology initiatives and coordination with different stakeholders (tech agencies, designers, govt. officials, Anganwadi, implementation partners) for the same Development of the Anganwadi Learning Lab concept - i.e., ideating and then demonstrating how the model will work, documentation and scale up of grassroots innovations.            Deep understanding of Policies around ECE around the globe          Develop an India-specific Early Childhood Development and Education-focused strategy, building towards systems change.            Oversee all technical aspects of the programme, design new initiatives and ensure quality of programme implementation.              Should have good understanding of evaluation and child assessments and can provide technical inputs.            Planning: Implementation plans, budgets, project management trackers etc. designed with inputs from partners and other Leads, aligned with ECE          Periodic review of project implementation and timely reporting of results.            Analyse student assessment data to track progress, identify trends, and make data-informed decisions to improve teaching and learning outcomes.              Conduct regular evaluations of the foundation level program to assess effectiveness, identify areas for improvement, and implement evidence-based practices to enhance program quality.            Strong project management skills with proven program implementation experience.          Prior hands-on experience in the Indian education sector and with government stakeholders.          Proven ability to design and drive data monitoring systems for large-scale projects.              Qualifications:          Required:            Bachelors /PG degree in Early Childhood Education or related field.              Minimum of 5-7 years of experience working in early childhood education              Strong knowledge of child development theories, early childhood curriculum frameworks, and best practices in early childhood education              Ability to work collaboratively with diverse stakeholders, including teachers, parents, administrators, and community members.              Knowledge of early childhood development principles and practices.              Strong interpersonal skills and ability to work effectively with children.              Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written.
column11: Health insurance, Interpersonal skills, Project implementation, Project management, child development, Educator, Programme implementation, Room, Monitoring, Teaching

column2: Project Role : Technology Educator Project Role Description : Instrumental in keeping technology talent market relevant, by upskilling and cross skilling them. Primarily responsible for delivering foundational training in technology, delivery, professional development and industry content. Contribute to course content development and creation of questions for certification and assessments.  Must have skills : Selenium Good to have skills : NA Minimum  3  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : BE B Tech or equivalent Qualification Summary :You will be responsible for delivering foundational training in technology, delivery, professional development, and industry content. Your typical day will involve upskilling and cross-skilling technology talent, contributing to course content development, and creating questions for certification and assessments.  Roles & Responsibilities: Deliver foundational training in technology, delivery, professional development, and industry content. Upskill and cross-skill technology talent to keep them market-relevant. Contribute to course content development and creation of questions for certification and assessments. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure training programs align with business objectives. Stay updated with the latest advancements in technology and industry trends to ensure training programs are current and relevant. Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Proficiency in Selenium. Good To Have Skills:Experience in other automation testing tools. Strong understanding of software testing methodologies and processes. Experience in designing and delivering training programs. Excellent communication and presentation skills. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 3 years of experience in Selenium. This position is based at our Bengaluru office. Qualification BE B Tech or equivalent Qualification

column2: Project Role : Technology Educator Project Role Description : Instrumental in keeping technology talent market relevant, by upskilling and cross skilling them. Primarily responsible for delivering foundational training in technology, delivery, professional development and industry content. Contribute to course content development and creation of questions for certification and assessments.  Must have skills : Selenium Good to have skills : NA Minimum  5  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : BE b Tech or equivalent IT Qualification Summary :As a Technology Educator, you will be responsible for delivering foundational training in technology, delivery, professional development, and industry content. Your typical day will involve upskilling and cross-skilling technology talent, contributing to course content development, and delivering impactful training sessions on Selenium.  Roles & Responsibilities: Deliver foundational training in technology, delivery, professional development, and industry content to upskill and cross-skill technology talent. Contribute to course content development and creation of questions for certification and assessments. column2: Pebble Creek Life School is looking for Telugu educator to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey     Language Instruction: Teaching Telugu language skills, including reading, writing, speaking, and comprehension, to students of various proficiency levels     Curriculum Development: Creating lesson plans, developing teaching materials, and designing activities to facilitate effective learning of the Telugu language     Cultural and Literary Studies: Introducing students to Telugu culture, literature, history, and traditions through educational resources and discussions     Assessment and Evaluation: Evaluating student progress through assessments, tests, and assignments to gauge language proficiency and comprehension     Cultural Events or Workshops: Organizing cultural events, workshops, or extracurricular activities to promote a deeper understanding and appreciation of Telugu culture     Qualifications and Skills:Proficiency in the Telugu language, including speaking, reading, and writing skills     Bachelor's or Master's degree in Telugu literature, linguistics, education, or a related field     Teaching certification or experience in language education is advantageous     Key Attributes:Passion for Teaching: Dedication to imparting knowledge and fostering a love for the Telugu language and culture     Communication Skills: Ability to effectively convey language concepts and cultural nuances to learners     Adaptability: Capability to tailor teaching methods to suit the needs and learning styles of diverse students     Cultural Sensitivity: Respect for cultural differences and the ability to promote cultural understanding
